name: Will This Bitter Night Bring Change? - Two Women in Trouble
name_original: Will This Bitter Night Bring Change? - Two Women in Trouble
description:
Follow Hornet and Emily in their attempt to escape the City, in all its neon glory.

This is a short narrative game built in the Narrat engine, based on the old fairytale "Brother and Sister." It was created for the Story Design course at the FHOOE.

Content warning: The game contains scenes with mild or abstract blood and gore, swearing, partial nudity, and stressful interpersonal conflict; please play at your own discretion.

This page is currently temporary, and the project is considered an open beta. As such, I would appreciate hearing your thoughts on the game!
